description: NutriTrack Backend - MERN Stack Health & Nutrition Tracking System with MongoDB

scripts.kill-port: node -e require('child_process').exec('lsof -ti:4000', (e,pid)=>{if(pid){console.log('Killing process', pid.trim()); require('child_process').exec('kill -9 '+pid.trim(), ()=>{console.log('Port 4000 freed!')})} else console.log('Port 4000 is free')})
